reviewText: good
great mystery double feature

Admittedly written with prejudice, since Perry Mason can do no wrong in my book. Raymond Burr fit the role like a glove and the writing is well paced and interesting all the way. Barbara Hale as Della Street was and still is a perfect match for Mason. Terriic viewing.
PERRY MASON has always been a great movie and show, Raymond Burr is supper in all of them.

What a way to continue the series but with each of the subsequent films.- TCOT Lost Love one of the best of the group.  With Burr and Hale together again  you have no  better screen couple  and to see them expand on the Perry/ Della relationship twenty plus years later was a joy!  It is a great purchase and will continue to complete my collection.
